channel.title: How to add trident of the seas spell?
channel.description: Is there a way to add trident of the seas spell? can someone tell me what to do? thanks!

item.title: How to add trident of the seas spell?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, here’s a not so direct guide…

  1. Get the animation and gfx files for the spell.
  2. Pack the animation and gfx files into the cache.
  3. Hardcode the animation data and gfx data, or find some way to pack the data into the cache… It’s possible, I don’t know how.
  4. ???
  5. Profit.

Alternatively, you could pack the OSRS anims/gfx into your cache, and change the readValues.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add trident of the seas spell?
